name: cors-express
description: Middleware to control CORS in an Express app

scripts.dev: clear && export NODE_ENV=development && npm install && npm update && ./node_modules/.bin/nodemon
scripts.devtest: clear && export NODE_ENV=development && npm install && ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --reporter spec
scripts.start: clear && export NODE_ENV=production && npm install && nodemon -e js,json,hbs

author: Kubide <hola@kubide.es> (http://kubide.es)
